name: Underdogs Gallery - the game
description:
Part puzzler, part platform, you need to promote your gallery, encourage visitors and get the art on the walls. Short but hopefully sweet game paying homage to the art gallery "Underdogs" in Lisbon.

Computer Keyboard is Z, X, Enter, Shift and direction buttons. Or you will get an interface on your phone. A, B, buttons, D-pad, select and start on the console (when you can download it).

This game was inspired by my local gallery which is called Underdogs. Underdogs is a cultural platform based in Lisbon, Portugal. It represents many graffiti artists who have crossed over into the fine arts. Vhils is one of the founders of the gallery.

Underdogs is also down the road from where I live. Over the years I have met many interesting artists there such as Shepard Fairey and Norman Cook (actually a musician aka Fatboy Slim). The gallery has a public art programme. Our neighbourhood and Lisbon at large has been made more visually interesting with murals from this programme.

If you are ever in Lisbon, certainly see whats on at the gallery and make a visit.

This game is made for the Game Boy and should play on DMG-01, pocket, colour and GB Advance. Download the ROM and pop it on your flash cart.

Please report any bugs.

Hope you have fun!

Underdogs website
